reviews.review: HL2 is a great game! If you are interested in playing any HL game i recommend playing them all!
One of the best FPS and best games of all time. Simple as that.

Kodumun oyununda bi araç sürme bölümleri var bide sonra silah ekliyorlar midemi allak bullak etti 
 (hiç kalkmadan half life 1 ve 2 yi bitirmeye kalktığım içinde midem bulanmış olabilir :D ama yinedee o araç kullanma bölümleri bok gibi ) Onun dışında oyun aşşırı iyi 2004 yılında çıkmasına rağmen şu an çıkan oyunların çoğuna taş çıkartır. 
UYARI:
(Bu bir yatırım tavsiyesi değildir)
18 TL vereceğine biraz sabret 12 - 13 Tl civarı bir fiyata hem Half-Life 1 - 2 ve episode 1 ile 2 yi al.

A+ Nostalgia
B Gameplay
A Puzzles
finished campaign this shit is fun as hell

Great story, Fun combat (although repetitive), and great sequel to the first game. Took me around 7 hours to beat, although it could probably be beaten quicker, i just suck at not dying every 5 seconds in games. 7/10, would recommend.
Отличная игра, управление удобное, противники легкие, огромный сюжет, можно залипнуть на много часов
This game is beautiful would play again in the future

Valve'ın gönüllerde olan yerini kazanmasını sağlayan yegane işlerden birisi. 2004 senesinde çıkmasına rağmen, bugün bile oynanılabilirliğini koruyabilen bir oyun. Tekrar etmeyen oynanışı, olayların ara sahne girmeden, kesintisiz anlatılması, iyi yazılmış karakterler ve iyi tasarlanmış mekanlar  sizi dünyanın içinde hissettirmeyi başarıyor. Kültleşmiş bu yapımı ve serinin diğer oyunlarını oynamanızı kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum.
Gameplay so good 16 years later that my balls were exploding
A pinnacle of first person shooting....Idc what anyone says, I'll buy the 3rd one, regardless of its platform, especially if its on VR.
This game is soo good man.

Ta Gra to zasrane gówno, w dodatku jest mega denerwująca podobnie jak w pierwszej częsci poziom trudnosci jest tu sztucznie pompowany przez debilne, zachowanie Gordona i jego kretyńskie zgony a przeciwnicy to jakieś zasrane terminatory wytrzymują, po kilka strzałow w banie a czasem nie daje, absolutnie nic cały magazynek wypruty w jednego przeciwnika szczerze nie polecam chyba żę ktoś ma nerwy, ze stali i wie że przy trzydziestym zgonie przez, tego samego przeciwnika nie rozwali komputera w każdym razie miłej zabawy. :) i powodzenia przyda sie

I když je to stará hra stále si myslím že i po těch letech je to stále fantastická hra. 10/10
A na pasáže s G-Manem jsem se vyloženě těšil
Wurde mal Zeit ein Klassiker nach zuholen Ich finde es Richtig Geil 11/10

Half-Life 2 is exactly what everyone says it is: A masterpiece. It's got everything from engaging story beats to gameplay that stays fresh from chapter to chapter. It's quite unfortunate that it took me nearly 17 years to play through this game, because despite its old age, Half-Life 2 manages to surpass many modern games as one of my favorites.

Este juego es uno de mis favoritos de la sexta generación y uno de los mejores juegos de disparos de la historia, el cambio entre la primera entrega y sus expansiones a esta segunda parte representa una manera ejemplar de como un videojuego debería evolucionar con el paso del tiempo, la forma de conectar la historia es bastante cohesiva sin huecos argumentales notables, el planteamiento pese a ser estandar la forma de contarlo es bastante original usando la clasica aura de misterio característica de Half life, pero mas alla de la narrativa la forma de jugar no se queda atras, dando peleas bastante buenas con el uso de un arsenal de armas bastante diverso ademas de que la pistola antigravedad permite usar la creatividad de formas bastante ingeniosas, el juego pese a no ser un mundo abierto es lo suficientemente libre para que el jugador decida resolver las cosas de su propia manera sin necesidad de usar un metodo predeterminado, lo que permite abrir posibilidades para la jugabilidad en terminos de resolucion de problemas, un juego bastante recomendado para cualquier jugador.
The shittiest game ever made - the sequel

bueno que decir sobre esta obra de arte . pasaron los años y sigue siendo un placer jugarlo una y otra vez. y mas con los logros de steam. estoy re manija consiguiendolos desbloquear a todos ojala me de una jugos a recompensa. xd
el juego es una bazofia, todo bazofia, he visto muchas bazofias pero este juego es la mayor bazofias entre las bazofias

3.9 for a few reasons. It might sound a little low, but this game is so great, that it simultaneously deserves a 5.0.

In short it's the lighting and the graphics, and the coining of new ideas in gaming that made it so great.

Are games getting worse? Well, I'm playing through all the Half-Life games again with my son and yes, games are getting worse. I enjoyed this as much now as I did on its release. Its head and shoulders above every modern AAA title.
